00053 static short testedgesidef(const float v1[2], const float v2[2], const float v3[2])
00054 {
00055     /* is v3 to the right of v1 - v2 ? With exception: v3 == v1 || v3 == v2 */
00056     double inp;
00057 
00058     //inp = (v2[cox] - v1[cox]) * (v1[coy] - v3[coy]) + (v1[coy] - v2[coy]) * (v1[cox] - v3[cox]);
00059     inp = (v2[0] - v1[0]) * (v1[1] - v3[1]) + (v1[1] - v2[1]) * (v1[0] - v3[0]);
00060 
00061     if (inp < 0.0) {
00062         return FALSE;
00063     }
00064     else if (inp == 0) {
00065         if (v1[0] == v3[0] && v1[1] == v3[1]) return FALSE;
00066         if (v2[0] == v3[0] && v2[1] == v3[1]) return FALSE;
00067     }
00068     return TRUE;
00069 }
00070 
00078 static void calc_poly_normal(float normal[3], float verts[][3], int nverts)
00079 {
00080     float const *v_prev = verts[nverts - 1];
00081     float const *v_curr = verts[0];
00082     float n[3] = {0.0f};
00083     int i;
00084 
00085     /* Newell's Method */
00086     for (i = 0; i < nverts; v_prev = v_curr, v_curr = verts[++i]) {
00087         add_newell_cross_v3_v3v3(n, v_prev, v_curr);
00088     }
00089 
00090     if (UNLIKELY(normalize_v3_v3(normal, n) == 0.0f)) {
00091         normal[2] = 1.0f; /* other axis set to 0.0 */
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00100 static void bm_face_calc_poly_normal(BMFace *f)
00101 {
00102     BMLoop *l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00103     BMLoop *l_iter  = l_first;
00104     float const *v_prev = l_first->prev->v->co;
00105     float const *v_curr = l_first->v->co;
00106     float n[3] = {0.0f};
00107 
00108     /* Newell's Method */
00109     do {
00110         add_newell_cross_v3_v3v3(n, v_prev, v_curr);
00111 
00112         l_iter = l_iter->next;
00113         v_prev = v_curr;
00114         v_curr = l_iter->v->co;
00115 
00116     } while (l_iter != l_first);
00117 
00118     if (UNLIKELY(normalize_v3_v3(f->no, n) == 0.0f)) {
00119         f->no[2] = 1.0f; /* other axis set to 0.0 */
00120     }
00121 }

00129 static void bm_face_calc_poly_normal_vertex_cos(BMFace *f, float n[3],
00130                                                 float const (*vertexCos)[3])
00131 {
00132     BMLoop *l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00133     BMLoop *l_iter  = l_first;
00134     float const *v_prev = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l_first->prev->v)];
00135     float const *v_curr = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l_first->v)];
00136 
00137     zero_v3(n);
00138 
00139     /* Newell's Method */
00140     do {
00141         add_newell_cross_v3_v3v3(n, v_prev, v_curr);
00142 
00143         l_iter = l_iter->next;
00144         v_prev = v_curr;
00145         v_curr = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->v)];
00146     } while (l_iter != l_first);
00147 
00148     if (UNLIKELY(normalize_v3(n) == 0.0f)) {
00149         n[2] = 1.0f; /* other axis set to 0.0 */
00150     }
00151 }

00156 float BM_face_calc_area(BMFace *f)
00157 {
00158     BMLoop *l;
00159     BMIter iter;
00160     float (*verts)[3];
00161     float normal[3];
00162     float area;
00163     int i;
00164 
00165     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(verts, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, f->len, __func__);
00166 
00167     BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (l, &iter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, i) {
00168         copy_v3_v3(verts[i], l->v->co);
00169     }
00170 
00171     if (f->len == 3) {
00172         area = area_tri_v3(verts[0], verts[1], verts[2]);
00173     }
00174     else if (f->len == 4) {
00175         area = area_quad_v3(verts[0], verts[1], verts[2], verts[3]);
00176     }
00177     else {
00178         calc_poly_normal(normal, verts, f->len);
00179         area = area_poly_v3(f->len, verts, normal);
00180     }
00181 
00182     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(verts);
00183 
00184     return area;
00185 }

00190 float BM_face_calc_perimeter(BMFace *f)
00191 {
00192     BMLoop *l_iter, *l_first;
00193     float perimeter = 0.0f;
00194 
00195     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00196     do {
00197         perimeter += len_v3v3(l_iter->v->co, l_iter->next->v->co);
00198     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00199 
00200     return perimeter;
00201 }

00206 void BM_face_calc_center_bounds(BMFace *f, float r_cent[3])
00207 {
00208     BMLoop *l_iter;
00209     BMLoop *l_first;
00210     float min[3], max[3];
00211 
00212     INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
00213 
00214     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00215     do {
00216         DO_MINMAX(l_iter->v->co, min, max);
00217     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00218 
00219     mid_v3_v3v3(r_cent, min, max);
00220 }

00225 void BM_face_calc_center_mean(BMFace *f, float r_cent[3])
00226 {
00227     BMLoop *l_iter;
00228     BMLoop *l_first;
00229 
00230     zero_v3(r_cent);
00231 
00232     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00233     do {
00234         add_v3_v3(r_cent, l_iter->v->co);
00235     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00236 
00237     if (f->len)
00238         mul_v3_fl(r_cent, 1.0f / (float) f->len);
00239 }

00248 void calc_poly_plane(float (*verts)[3], const int nverts)
00249 {
00250     
00251     float avgc[3], norm[3], mag, avgn[3];
00252     float *v1, *v2, *v3;
00253     int i;
00254     
00255     if (nverts < 3)
00256         return;
00257 
00258     zero_v3(avgn);
00259     zero_v3(avgc);
00260 
00261     for (i = 0; i < nverts; i++) {
00262         v1 = verts[i];
00263         v2 = verts[(i + 1) % nverts];
00264         v3 = verts[(i + 2) % nverts];
00265         normal_tri_v3(norm, v1, v2, v3);
00266 
00267         add_v3_v3(avgn, norm);
00268     }
00269 
00270     if (UNLIKELY(normalize_v3(avgn) == 0.0f)) {
00271         avgn[2] = 1.0f;
00272     }
00273     
00274     for (i = 0; i < nverts; i++) {
00275         v1 = verts[i];
00276         mag = dot_v3v3(v1, avgn);
00277         madd_v3_v3fl(v1, avgn, -mag);
00278     }
00279 }
00280 
00288 static void shrink_edgef(float v1[3], float v2[3], const float fac)
00289 {
00290     float mid[3];
00291 
00292     mid_v3_v3v3(mid, v1, v2);
00293 
00294     sub_v3_v3v3(v1, v1, mid);
00295     sub_v3_v3v3(v2, v2, mid);
00296 
00297     mul_v3_fl(v1, fac);
00298     mul_v3_fl(v2, fac);
00299 
00300     add_v3_v3v3(v1, v1, mid);
00301     add_v3_v3v3(v2, v2, mid);
00302 }

00311 void poly_rotate_plane(const float normal[3], float (*verts)[3], const int nverts)
00312 {
00313 
00314     float up[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f}, axis[3], q[4];
00315     float mat[3][3];
00316     double angle;
00317     int i;
00318 
00319     cross_v3_v3v3(axis, normal, up);
00320 
00321     angle = saacos(dot_v3v3(normal, up));
00322 
00323     if (angle == 0.0) return;
00324 
00325     axis_angle_to_quat(q, axis, (float)angle);
00326     quat_to_mat3(mat, q);
00327 
00328     for (i = 0; i < nverts; i++)
00329         mul_m3_v3(mat, verts[i]);
00330 }

00338     BMFace *f;
00339     
00340     BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &iter, e, BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
00341         BM_face_normal_update(f);
00342     }
00343 
00344     BM_vert_normal_update(e->v1);

00351 void BM_vert_normal_update(BMVert *v)
00352 {
00353     /* TODO, we can normalize each edge only once, then compare with previous edge */
00354 
00355     BMIter liter;
00356     BMLoop *l;
00357     float vec1[3], vec2[3], fac;
00358     int len = 0;
00359 
00360     zero_v3(v->no);
00361 
00362     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00363         /* Same calculation used in BM_mesh_normals_update */
00364         sub_v3_v3v3(vec1, l->v->co, l->prev->v->co);
00365         sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, l->next->v->co, l->v->co);
00366         normalize_v3(vec1);
00367         normalize_v3(vec2);
00368 
00369         fac = saacos(-dot_v3v3(vec1, vec2));
00370 
00371         madd_v3_v3fl(v->no, l->f->no, fac);
00372 
00373         len++;
00374     }
00375 
00376     if (len) {
00377         normalize_v3(v->no);
00378     }
00379 }

00388     }

00403 void BM_face_normal_update(BMFace *f)
00404 {
00405     BMLoop *l;
00406 
00407     /* common cases first */
00408     switch (f->len) {
00409         case 4:
00410         {
00411             const float *co1 = (l = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f))->v->co;
00412             const float *co2 = (l = l->next)->v->co;
00413             const float *co3 = (l = l->next)->v->co;
00414             const float *co4 = (l->next)->v->co;
00415 
00416             normal_quad_v3(f->no, co1, co2, co3, co4);
00417             break;
00418         }
00419         case 3:
00420         {
00421             const float *co1 = (l = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f))->v->co;
00422             const float *co2 = (l = l->next)->v->co;
00423             const float *co3 = (l->next)->v->co;
00424 
00425             normal_tri_v3(f->no, co1, co2, co3);
00426             break;
00427         }
00428         case 0:
00429         {
00430             zero_v3(f->no);
00431             break;
00432         }
00433         default:
00434         {
00435             bm_face_calc_poly_normal(f);
00436             break;
00437         }
00438     }
00439 }
00440 /* exact same as 'bmesh_face_normal_update' but accepts vertex coords */
00441 void BM_face_normal_update_vcos(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, float no[3],
00442                                 float const (*vertexCos)[3])
00443 {
00444     BMLoop *l;
00445 
00446     /* must have valid index data */
00447     BLI_assert((bm->elem_index_dirty & BM_VERT) == 0);
00448     (void)bm;
00449 
00450     /* common cases first */
00451     switch (f->len) {
00452         case 4:
00453         {
00454             const float *co1 = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get((l = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f))->v)];
00455             const float *co2 = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get((l = l->next)->v)];
00456             const float *co3 = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get((l = l->next)->v)];
00457             const float *co4 = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get((l->next)->v)];
00458 
00459             normal_quad_v3(no, co1, co2, co3, co4);
00460             break;
00461         }
00462         case 3:
00463         {
00464             const float *co1 = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get((l = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f))->v)];
00465             const float *co2 = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get((l = l->next)->v)];
00466             const float *co3 = vertexCos[BM_elem_index_get((l->next)->v)];
00467 
00468             normal_tri_v3(no, co1, co2, co3);
00469             break;
00470         }
00471         case 0:
00472         {
00473             zero_v3(no);
00474             break;
00475         }
00476         default:
00477         {
00478             bm_face_calc_poly_normal_vertex_cos(f, no, vertexCos);
00479             break;
00480         }
00481     }
00482 }

00491 {

00493     negate_v3(f->no);
00494 }
00495 
00496 /* detects if two line segments cross each other (intersects).
00497  * note, there could be more winding cases then there needs to be. */
00498 static int linecrossesf(const float v1[2], const float v2[2], const float v3[2], const float v4[2])
00499 {
00500 
00501 #define GETMIN2_AXIS(a, b, ma, mb, axis)   \
00502     {                                      \
00503         ma[axis] = MIN2(a[axis], b[axis]); \
00504         mb[axis] = MAX2(a[axis], b[axis]); \
00505     } (void)0
00506 
00507 #define GETMIN2(a, b, ma, mb)          \
00508     {                                  \
00509         GETMIN2_AXIS(a, b, ma, mb, 0); \
00510         GETMIN2_AXIS(a, b, ma, mb, 1); \
00511     } (void)0
00512 
00513 #define EPS (FLT_EPSILON * 15)
00514 
00515     int w1, w2, w3, w4, w5 /*, re */;
00516     float mv1[2], mv2[2], mv3[2], mv4[2];
00517     
00518     /* now test winding */
00519     w1 = testedgesidef(v1, v3, v2);
00520     w2 = testedgesidef(v2, v4, v1);
00521     w3 = !testedgesidef(v1, v2, v3);
00522     w4 = testedgesidef(v3, v2, v4);
00523     w5 = !testedgesidef(v3, v1, v4);
00524     
00525     if (w1 == w2 && w2 == w3 && w3 == w4 && w4 == w5) {
00526         return TRUE;
00527     }
00528     
00529     GETMIN2(v1, v2, mv1, mv2);
00530     GETMIN2(v3, v4, mv3, mv4);
00531     
00532     /* do an interval test on the x and y axes */
00533     /* first do x axis */
00534     if (ABS(v1[1] - v2[1]) < EPS &&
00535         ABS(v3[1] - v4[1]) < EPS &&
00536         ABS(v1[1] - v3[1]) < EPS)
00537     {
00538         return (mv4[0] >= mv1[0] && mv3[0] <= mv2[0]);
00539     }
00540 
00541     /* now do y axis */
00542     if (ABS(v1[0] - v2[0]) < EPS &&
00543         ABS(v3[0] - v4[0]) < EPS &&
00544         ABS(v1[0] - v3[0]) < EPS)
00545     {
00546         return (mv4[1] >= mv1[1] && mv3[1] <= mv2[1]);
00547     }
00548 
00549     return FALSE;
00550 
00551 #undef GETMIN2_AXIS
00552 #undef GETMIN2
00553 #undef EPS
00554 
00555 }
00556 
00567 int BM_face_point_inside_test(BMFace *f, const float co[3])
00568 {
00569     int ax, ay;
00570     float co2[2], cent[2] = {0.0f, 0.0f}, out[2] = {FLT_MAX * 0.5f, FLT_MAX * 0.5f};
00571     BMLoop *l_iter;
00572     BMLoop *l_first;
00573     int crosses = 0;
00574     float onepluseps = 1.0f + (float)FLT_EPSILON * 150.0f;
00575     
00576     if (dot_v3v3(f->no, f->no) <= FLT_EPSILON * 10)
00577         BM_face_normal_update(f);
00578     
00579     /* find best projection of face XY, XZ or YZ: barycentric weights of
00580      * the 2d projected coords are the same and faster to compute
00581      *
00582      * this probably isn't all that accurate, but it has the advantage of
00583      * being fast (especially compared to projecting into the face orientation)
00584      */
00585     axis_dominant_v3(&ax, &ay, f->no);
00586 
00587     co2[0] = co[ax];
00588     co2[1] = co[ay];
00589     
00590     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00591     do {
00592         cent[0] += l_iter->v->co[ax];
00593         cent[1] += l_iter->v->co[ay];
00594     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00595     
00596     mul_v2_fl(cent, 1.0f / (float)f->len);
00597     
00598     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00599     do {
00600         float v1[2], v2[2];
00601         
00602         v1[0] = (l_iter->prev->v->co[ax] - cent[ax]) * onepluseps + cent[ax];
00603         v1[1] = (l_iter->prev->v->co[ay] - cent[ay]) * onepluseps + cent[ay];
00604         
00605         v2[0] = (l_iter->v->co[ax] - cent[ax]) * onepluseps + cent[ax];
00606         v2[1] = (l_iter->v->co[ay] - cent[ay]) * onepluseps + cent[ay];
00607         
00608         crosses += linecrossesf(v1, v2, co2, out) != 0;
00609     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00610     
00611     return crosses % 2 != 0;
00612 }
00613 
00614 static int bm_face_goodline(float const (*projectverts)[3], BMFace *f,
00615                             int v1i, int v2i, int v3i,
00616                             int UNUSED(nvert))
00617 {
00618     BMLoop *l_iter;
00619     BMLoop *l_first;
00620     float v1[3], v2[3], v3[3], pv1[3], pv2[3];
00621     int i;
00622 
00623     copy_v3_v3(v1, projectverts[v1i]);
00624     copy_v3_v3(v2, projectverts[v2i]);
00625     copy_v3_v3(v3, projectverts[v3i]);
00626     
00627     if (testedgesidef(v1, v2, v3)) {
00628         return FALSE;
00629     }
00630 
00631     //for (i = 0; i < nvert; i++) {
00632     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00633     do {
00634         i = BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->v);
00635         if (i == v1i || i == v2i || i == v3i) {
00636             continue;
00637         }
00638         
00639         copy_v3_v3(pv1, projectverts[BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->v)]);
00640         copy_v3_v3(pv2, projectverts[BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->next->v)]);
00641         
00642         //if (linecrossesf(pv1, pv2, v1, v3)) return FALSE;
00643 
00644         if (isect_point_tri_v2(pv1, v1, v2, v3) ||
00645             isect_point_tri_v2(pv1, v3, v2, v1))
00646         {
00647             return FALSE;
00648         }
00649     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00650     return TRUE;
00651 }
00652 
00662 static BMLoop *find_ear(BMFace *f, float (*verts)[3], const int nvert, const int use_beauty)
00663 {
00664     BMLoop *bestear = NULL;
00665 
00666     BMLoop *l_iter;
00667     BMLoop *l_first;
00668 
00669     if (f->len == 4) {
00670         BMLoop *larr[4];
00671         int i = 0;
00672 
00673         l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00674         do {
00675             larr[i] = l_iter;
00676             i++;
00677         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00678 
00679         /* pick 0/1 based on best lenth */
00680         bestear = larr[(((len_squared_v3v3(larr[0]->v->co, larr[2]->v->co) >
00681                           len_squared_v3v3(larr[1]->v->co, larr[3]->v->co))) != use_beauty)];
00682 
00683     }
00684     else {
00685         BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3;
00686 
00687         /* float angle, bestangle = 180.0f; */
00688         int isear /*, i = 0 */;
00689 
00690         l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00691         do {
00692             isear = TRUE;
00693 
00694             v1 = l_iter->prev->v;
00695             v2 = l_iter->v;
00696             v3 = l_iter->next->v;
00697 
00698             if (BM_edge_exists(v1, v3)) {
00699                 isear = FALSE;
00700             }
00701             else if (!bm_face_goodline((float const (*)[3])verts, f,
00702                                        BM_elem_index_get(v1), BM_elem_index_get(v2), BM_elem_index_get(v3),
00703                                        nvert))
00704             {
00705                 isear = FALSE;
00706             }
00707 
00708             if (isear) {
00709     #if 0
00710                 /* if this code comes back, it needs to be converted to radians */
00711                 angle = angle_v3v3v3(verts[v1->head.eflag2], verts[v2->head.eflag2], verts[v3->head.eflag2]);
00712                 if (!bestear || ABS(angle - 45.0f) < bestangle) {
00713                     bestear = l;
00714                     bestangle = ABS(45.0f - angle);
00715                 }
00716 
00717                 if (angle > 20 && angle < 90) break;
00718                 if (angle < 100 && i > 5) break;
00719                 i += 1;
00720     #endif
00721 
00722                 bestear = l_iter;
00723                 break;
00724             }
00725         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00726     }
00727 
00728     return bestear;
00729 }
00730 
00746 void BM_face_triangulate(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, float (*projectverts)[3],
00747                          const short newedge_oflag, const short newface_oflag, BMFace **newfaces,
00748                          const short use_beauty)
00749 {
00750     int i, done, nvert, nf_i = 0;
00751     BMLoop *newl, *nextloop;
00752     BMLoop *l_iter;
00753     BMLoop *l_first;
00754     /* BMVert *v; */ /* UNUSED */
00755 
00756     /* copy vertex coordinates to vertspace arra */
00757     i = 0;
00758     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00759     do {
00760         copy_v3_v3(projectverts[i], l_iter->v->co);
00761         BM_elem_index_set(l_iter->v, i); /* set dirty! */
00762         i++;
00763     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00764 
00765     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_VERT; /* see above */
00766 
00768 
00769     calc_poly_normal(f->no, projectverts, f->len);
00770     poly_rotate_plane(f->no, projectverts, i);
00771 
00772     nvert = f->len;
00773 
00774     //calc_poly_plane(projectverts, i);
00775     for (i = 0; i < nvert; i++) {
00776         projectverts[i][2] = 0.0f;
00777     }
00778 
00779     done = 0;
00780     while (!done && f->len > 3) {
00781         done = 1;
00782         l_iter = find_ear(f, projectverts, nvert, use_beauty);
00783         if (l_iter) {
00784             done = 0;
00785             /* v = l->v; */ /* UNUSED */
00786             f = BM_face_split(bm, l_iter->f, l_iter->prev->v,
00787                               l_iter->next->v,
00788                               &newl, NULL, TRUE);
00789 
00790             if (UNLIKELY(!f)) {
00791                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: triangulator failed to split face! (bmesh internal error)\n", __func__);
00792                 break;
00793             }
00794 
00795             copy_v3_v3(f->no, l_iter->f->no);
00796             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, newl->e, newedge_oflag);
00797             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, newface_oflag);
00798             
00799             if (newfaces) newfaces[nf_i++] = f;
00800 
00801 #if 0
00802             l = f->loopbase;
00803             do {
00804                 if (l->v == v) {
00805                     f->loopbase = l;
00806                     break;
00807                 }
00808                 l = l->next;
00809             } while (l != f->loopbase);
00810 #endif
00811 
00812         }
00813     }
00814 
00815     if (f->len > 3) {
00816         l_iter = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00817         while (l_iter->f->len > 3) {
00818             nextloop = l_iter->next->next;
00819             f = BM_face_split(bm, l_iter->f, l_iter->v, nextloop->v,
00820                               &newl, NULL, TRUE);
00821             if (!f) {
00822                 printf("triangle fan step of triangulator failed.\n");
00823 
00824                 /* NULL-terminate */
00825                 if (newfaces) newfaces[nf_i] = NULL;
00826                 return;
00827             }
00828 
00829             if (newfaces) newfaces[nf_i++] = f;
00830             
00831             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, newl->e, newedge_oflag);
00832             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, newface_oflag);
00833             l_iter = nextloop;
00834         }
00835     }
00836     
00837     /* NULL-terminate */
00838     if (newfaces) newfaces[nf_i] = NULL;
00839 }
00840 
00849 void BM_face_legal_splits(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, BMLoop *(*loops)[2], int len)
00850 {
00851     BMIter iter;
00852     BMLoop *l;
00853     float v1[3], v2[3], v3[3] /*, v4[3 */, no[3], mid[3], *p1, *p2, *p3, *p4;
00854     float out[3] = {-234324.0f, -234324.0f, 0.0f};
00855     float (*projverts)[3];
00856     float (*edgeverts)[3];
00857     float fac1 = 1.0000001f, fac2 = 0.9f; //9999f; //0.999f;
00858     int i, j, a = 0, clen;
00859 
00860     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(projverts, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, f->len,      "projvertsb");
00861     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(edgeverts, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE * 2, len * 2, "edgevertsb");
00862     
00863     i = 0;
00864     l = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, f);
00865     for ( ; l; l = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00866         BM_elem_index_set(l, i); /* set_loop */
00867         copy_v3_v3(projverts[i], l->v->co);
00868         i++;
00869     }
00870     
00871     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00872         copy_v3_v3(v1, loops[i][0]->v->co);
00873         copy_v3_v3(v2, loops[i][1]->v->co);
00874 
00875         shrink_edgef(v1, v2, fac2);
00876         
00877         copy_v3_v3(edgeverts[a], v1);
00878         a++;
00879         copy_v3_v3(edgeverts[a], v2);
00880         a++;
00881     }
00882     
00883     calc_poly_normal(no, projverts, f->len);
00884     poly_rotate_plane(no, projverts, f->len);
00885     poly_rotate_plane(no, edgeverts, len * 2);
00886 
00887     for (i = 0, l = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f); i < f->len; i++, l = l->next) {
00888         p1 = projverts[i];
00889         out[0] = MAX2(out[0], p1[0]) + 0.01f;
00890         out[1] = MAX2(out[1], p1[1]) + 0.01f;
00891         out[2] = 0.0f;
00892         p1[2] = 0.0f;
00893 
00894         //copy_v3_v3(l->v->co, p1);
00895     }
00896     
00897     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00898         edgeverts[i * 2][2] = 0.0f;
00899         edgeverts[i * 2 + 1][2] = 0.0f;
00900     }
00901 
00902     /* do convexity test */
00903     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00904         copy_v3_v3(v2, edgeverts[i * 2]);
00905         copy_v3_v3(v3, edgeverts[i * 2 + 1]);
00906 
00907         mid_v3_v3v3(mid, v2, v3);
00908         
00909         clen = 0;
00910         for (j = 0; j < f->len; j++) {
00911             p1 = projverts[j];
00912             p2 = projverts[(j + 1) % f->len];
00913             
00914             copy_v3_v3(v1, p1);
00915             copy_v3_v3(v2, p2);
00916 
00917             shrink_edgef(v1, v2, fac1);
00918 
00919             if (linecrossesf(p1, p2, mid, out)) clen++;
00920         }
00921         
00922         if (clen % 2 == 0) {
00923             loops[i][0] = NULL;
00924         }
00925     }
00926     
00927     /* do line crossing test */
00928     for (i = 0; i < f->len; i++) {
00929         p1 = projverts[i];
00930         p2 = projverts[(i + 1) % f->len];
00931         
00932         copy_v3_v3(v1, p1);
00933         copy_v3_v3(v2, p2);
00934 
00935         shrink_edgef(v1, v2, fac1);
00936 
00937         for (j = 0; j < len; j++) {
00938             if (!loops[j][0]) {
00939                 continue;
00940             }
00941 
00942             p3 = edgeverts[j * 2];
00943             p4 = edgeverts[j * 2 + 1];
00944 
00945             if (linecrossesf(v1, v2, p3, p4)) {
00946                 loops[j][0] = NULL;
00947             }
00948         }
00949     }
00950 
00951     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00952         for (j = 0; j < len; j++) {
00953             if (j != i && loops[i][0] && loops[j][0]) {
00954                 p1 = edgeverts[i * 2];
00955                 p2 = edgeverts[i * 2 + 1];
00956                 p3 = edgeverts[j * 2];
00957                 p4 = edgeverts[j * 2 + 1];
00958 
00959                 copy_v3_v3(v1, p1);
00960                 copy_v3_v3(v2, p2);
00961 
00962                 shrink_edgef(v1, v2, fac1);
00963 
00964                 if (linecrossesf(v1, v2, p3, p4)) {
00965                     loops[i][0] = NULL;
00966                 }
00967             }
00968         }
00969     }
00970 
00971     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(projverts);
00972     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(edgeverts);
00973 }
